overview: Temptation is hard to resist, especially if the thing that's tempting you has the face of an angel, the body of a young Adonis and a big, fat cock. Six lads give in to temptation in the dorm as an orgy ensues that sees these boys kissing a different mouth, sucking a different cock and raw plugging a different ass at every turn. The allurement of a hard body and handsome face proves a little too much for the boys in the locker room as testosterone hangs heavy and these guys succumb and indulge their every sexual whim. Resistance is futile where these Twink Temptations are concerned.
title: Twink Temptations
